title: Best of The Herd: 08/23/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/23/2019
description:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin and talks about Jerry Jones feeling that Ezekiel Elliott is being ungrateful in his holdout.  He thinks the NFL preseason may have died on Thursday night in Canada.  Plus, the new FOX Big Noon Kickoff crew of Urban Meyer, Matt Leinart, Reggie Bush, Brady Quinn and Rob Stone join Doug in studio to discuss Trevor Lawrence, the pressure of repeating as champions and is Texas is back again in 2019 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
